lesson_description: Reinforce learning by connecting classroom instruction to individual problem solving and practice. MATHia serves as the primary instructional tool in these lessons.
learning_goals: I can work independently on my MATHia playlist and engage in activities to support my individual learning goals.

lesson_structure_and_pacing_guide.title: Odd One Out: Fractions
lesson_structure_and_pacing_guide.description: Students analyze and compare fraction multiplication and division models and expressions.

lesson_structure_and_pacing_guide.title: Personalized Learning and Intervention
lesson_structure_and_pacing_guide.description:
### MATHia Playlist

#### Representing Fraction Division
Students watch an animation and answer questions to understand fraction division models.

#### Interpreting Remainders Using Models
Students compute quotients of fractions using visual fraction models.

#### Developing the Fraction Division Algorithm
Students develop an understanding of the fraction division algorithm by analyzing worked examples and completing partial examples.

### Clarify

#### Center A: Interactive Skills Practice
Students complete the Problem Set 6: Representing Fraction Division interactive skills practice to develop a conceptual understanding of dividing whole numbers by fractions and fractions by fractions.

### Re-Teach

#### Center B: MATHstream Interactive Video
Students complete a MATHstream video based on the instruction they missed.
• Lesson 7 I'd Divide
º Dividing with Fractions
º Rewriting Fraction by Fraction Division Sentences as Multiplication Sentences
